channel.title: I cant run any CMD
channel.description:
Well i click start, run, cmd and it opens, Im looking to portforward so im doing ipconfig/all and when i do that or anything else in the CMD window i get
[Code]'Ipconfig' is not recognized as an internal or external command, Operable program or batch file.[/code]
And i get that everytime i do something in CMD, help please =D
Much appreiciated

item.title: I cant run any CMD

Vista rocks what r u talking about, dont be hatin vista

Read full topic

item.title: I cant run any CMD
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

It appears as if you have replaced it with your JDK path. I did the exact same thing on Vista today (Which btw sucks). Jmeâ€™s solution worked fine; perhaps you should keep trying and see if somewhere along the line you have gone wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant run any CMD
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

Yes im using windows xp, jme ill try it now

Path on bottom or top

Edit::

That didnt work. I remember i replaced it t get my runescape private serve, then when i quit and i found out the problem with my cmd so i deleted paths, and i jsut added them back and did that and still problem

Read full topic

item.title: I cant run any CMD
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

You most likely replaced your PATH variable.

Add this to the end of your PATH variable: ;%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem

(Right click my computer>properties>advanced>environment variables, then go to the system variables and look for PATH and add that to the end)

Read full topic
